actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-573.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.471 Reported to House.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6267) to revitalize the housing industry by strengthening the financial stability of home mortgage lending institutions and ensuring the availability of home mortgage loans.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6267 (Home mortgages).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6267) to revitalize the housing industry by strengthening the financial stability of home mortgage lending institutions and ensuring the availability of home mortgage loans.
